title: Data Science Tools & IDEs
subject: Data Science
prerequisites: Introduction to Python for Data Science
theory:
The choice of IDE depends on the task.
- **Jupyter/Colab**: Exploration, Visualization, Education.
- **VS Code/PyCharm**: Production code, developing Python packages, MLOps.

real_world_use_cases.description: Google Colab allows simultaneous editing like Google Docs, great for team experiments.

summary: Tools enable the workflow; choose the right one for the phase (Dev vs Prod).
